Title: Employee monitoring with DocuSign Monitor API
ApiDecription:
This sample features:

  • Retrieve monitoring data
  • Bulk export user data
  • Monitor API for an organization

Code flow:

View source file BaseMonitorService.php on GitHub.

Once equipment and software are assigned and permission profiles are modified, the changes should be visible on the dashboard. The Monitor events are retrieved using DataSet:getStream.

You can also export the list of employees into a .csv file. The file is exported with UserExport:getUserListExport.
